text: Darwin Pantoja (born 25 September 1990) is a Colombian former professional racing cyclist. ==Major results== ;2010 : 6th Overall Vuelta al Ecuador ;2013 : 1st Stage 2 Vuelta al Ecuador ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male cyclists Category:People from Nariño Department
title: Darwin Pantoja
